data.message: way matterers, we need to chose, its like being in some momento, and then everything gones, when we chose we have no time at all for other things, family, friends, fun all goes a side cauz we chose to grow up, and then we understand how we will find our own percepttion of things, if we decide to stop we will fall, theres a lot of way ahead and every yard is important, we dont stop ever we just decide to be here and there fear am jealous they are just what we think, our social sinism and we cant fight society, we are society so we chose for ourselves and that is what it matters asshole
